text: Duryodhan Mahalingappa Aihole is a Bharatiya Janata Party political activist and member of the Karnataka Legislative Assembly. He contested the 2013 Karnataka Legislative Assembly elections from Raibag assembly constituency and won polling 37,535.https://news.webindia123.com/news/articles/india/20121113/2100704.html == References == == External links == *Duryodhan Mahalingappa Aihole affidavit Category:Living people Category:Karnataka MLAs 2013–2018 Category:Bharatiya Janata Party politicians from Karnataka Category:1957 births
title: Duryodhan Mahalingappa Aihole
